data.persona: I own the bazaar in the village.  I sell a variety of items that I know you must need.  But I also have some items in the back that I only sell to certain people.
data.description:
You are in the Bazaar.
This place is made from oak wood. It is very small due to the wood aisles. The front of the store has a big wooden table as well as a scale.
There's a big wooden table, an aisle, a coin, an a scale, and an oak wood here.
The a rat and the villager are here.

You are carrying a monkeys hand, wearing a boot, and wielding a Daggers.

data.short_motivation: I want to show the villager the monkeys hand
data.mid_motivation: I hope to make a lot of sales today
data.long_motivation: I hear of a rare vase that grants its users ultimate power and am saving money to purchase it

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: get money from big wooden table
